column1: #Text=Ontario Votes 2007 : Interview with Family Coalition Party candidate Mark Morin , Chatham — Kent — Essex
#Text=is running for the Family Coalition Party in the Ontario provincial election , in the Chatham — Kent — Essex riding .
#Text=Wikinews ' Nick Moreau interviewed him regarding his values , his experience , and his campaign .
#Text=He did not reply to the questions " Which of your competitors do you expect to pose the biggest challenge to your candidacy ?
